channel.title: Choco-Solver on See Hiong's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Choco-Solver on See Hiong's Blog

item.title: Efficient TSP Solver API with Micronaut
item.description: Solve the Travelling Salesman Problem using Choco-solver and convert it into a powerful API with Micronaut. Explore the efficient solution and its integration for optimal city tours.
